articles.title: Rising energy costs lift US consumer prices 0.2% in December
articles.description: Rising gasoline prices lift US consumer inflation 0.2% in December; workers’ earnings don’t keep up
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- 
Rising energy costs drove U.S. consumer prices higher in December, and American workers earnings couldnt keep up.
